com.gsma.mobileconnect.r2.rest
Interface IRestClient

All Known Implementing Classes:
RestClient
public interface IRestClient

Wrapper for Http requests, returning a simple normalised response object.

Since:
2.0

Method Summary
 RestResponse get(java.net.URI uri, RestAuthentication authentication, java.lang.String sourceIp, java.util.List<KeyValuePair> queryParams, java.lang.Iterable<KeyValuePair> cookies)

          Executes a HTTP POST to the supplied uri with the supplied HttpContent object, with optional cookies.

Method Detail

get

RestResponse get(java.net.URI uri,
                 RestAuthentication authentication,
                 java.lang.String sourceIp,
                 java.util.List<KeyValuePair> queryParams,
                 java.lang.Iterable<KeyValuePair> cookies)
                 throws RequestFailedException
Executes a HTTP GET to the supplied uri optional basic auth and optional cookies.

Parameters:
uri - of the POST.
authentication - value to be used (if auth required).
queryParams - to be added to the GET request.
sourceIp - of the request (if identified).
cookies - to add to the request (if required).
Returns:
future RestResponse.
Throws:
RequestFailedException - if there is a failure issuing the request.

                          RestAuthentication authentication,
                          java.util.List<KeyValuePair> formData,
                          java.lang.String sourceIp,
                          java.lang.Iterable<KeyValuePair> cookies)
                          throws RequestFailedException
Executes a HTTP POST to the supplied uri with x-www-form-urlencoded content and optional cookies

Parameters:
uri - of the POST.
authentication - value to be used (if auth required).
formData - to be added to the POST request.
sourceIp - of the request (if identified).
cookies - to add to the request (if required).
Returns:
future RestResponse.
Throws:
RequestFailedException - if there is a failure issuing the request.

postJsonContent

RestResponse postJsonContent(java.net.URI uri,
                             RestAuthentication authentication,
                             java.lang.Object content,
                             java.lang.String sourceIp,
                             java.lang.Iterable<KeyValuePair> cookies)
                             throws RequestFailedException
Executes a HTTP POST to the supplied uri with the supplied content deserialize to json, with optional cookies.

Parameters:
uri - of the POST.
authentication - value to be used (if auth required).
content - of the POST request to deserialise as json.
sourceIp - of the request (if identified).
cookies - to add to the request (if required).
Returns:
future RestResponse.
Throws:
RequestFailedException - if there is a failure issuing the request.

postStringContent

RestResponse postStringContent(java.net.URI uri,
                               RestAuthentication authentication,
                               java.lang.String content,
                               org.apache.http.entity.ContentType contentType,
                               java.lang.String sourceIp,
                               java.lang.Iterable<KeyValuePair> cookies)
                               throws RequestFailedException
Executes a HTTP POST to the supplied uri with the supplied content type and content, with optional cookies.

Parameters:
uri - of the POST.
authentication - value to be used (if auth required).
content - of the POST request.
contentType - of the POST request.
sourceIp - of the request (if identified).
cookies - to add to the request (if required).
Returns:
future RestResponse.
Throws:
RequestFailedException - if there is a failure issuing the request.

postContent

RestResponse postContent(java.net.URI uri,
                         RestAuthentication authentication,
                         org.apache.http.HttpEntity content,
                         java.lang.String sourceIp,
                         java.lang.Iterable<KeyValuePair> cookies)
                         throws RequestFailedException
Executes a HTTP POST to the supplied uri with the supplied HttpContent object, with optional cookies. Used as the base for other PostAsync methods.

Parameters:
uri - of the POST.
authentication - value to be used (if auth required).
content - of the POST request.
sourceIp - of the request (if identified).
cookies - to add to the request (if required).
Returns:
future RestResponse.
Throws:
RequestFailedException - if there is a failure issuing the request.
